messages.text:
LGTM

(can we also make them smaller?)
- gri

On Tue, Feb 14, 2012 at 3:17 PM,  <adg@golang.org> wrote:
> Reviewers: gri,
>
> Message:
> Hello gri (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go
>
>
> Description:
> doc: grey out line numbers
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/5675049/
>
> Affected files:
>  M doc/style.css
>
>
> Index: doc/style.css
> ===================================================================
> --- a/doc/style.css
> +++ b/doc/style.css
> @@ -10,6 +10,9 @@
>  pre .comment {
>        color: #375EAB;
>  }
> +pre .ln {
> +       color: #999;
> +}
>  body {
>        color: #222;
>  }
>
>

On 15 February 2012 10:29, Robert Griesemer <gri@golang.org> wrote:
> (can we also make them smaller?)

I tried that but it created jarring alignment issues.

Hello gri (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

doc: grey out line numbers
